If want to join the ‘ground-floor’ of a massive transformational effort and feel excited by the opportunity to use technology to define new computing paradigms and business opportunities – this role may be just the right opportunity for you!Job SummaryThe Consultant, NESS Product Manager is a highly visible member of the Dell Technologies Product Offering & Portfolio Management organization.  They will help drive our rapidly growing business and offer portfolio.  A strong candidate will work at both a strategic and operational level to drive initiatives and guide the business to focus on product planning, operations and customer experience.This position requires extensive cross-functional leadership and coordination, excellent oral and written communication skills, and the ability to formulate issues and recommendations clearly. Attention to detail, product management skills, and a highly organized, process-focused mind are required to manage team priorities and deliverables. You must be able to execute under pressure & deadlines and drive forward even when faced with ambiguity.REQUIREDManages product launches, core positioning and messaging, sales training and marketing programs for assigned products.  Guides product introductions and product updates.Responsibilities include assessing market requirements, investigating new technologies, developing recommendations for technical product direction, establishing plans as well as strategies and roadmap plan-of-records.Responsible for product business plan, forecasts, profit and loss, margins, risk factors, overall business plan, pricing analysis and recommendationsPerforms business analysis of current and future market segmentsInterfaces with all levels of organization including the executive management team as well as external customers, executive management, press & industry analystsDESIREDExcellent communications skills with ability to simplify and explain complex problems to stakeholders of all levels across multiple functions, with a willingness to challenge when necessary.Expert understanding of internal business processes and systems capabilities, particularly in the area of product management, product marketing, engineering and related functions. Superior organizational skills and project/time management abilities, with ability to juggle multiple projects and priorities at the same time. Ability to form strong business relationships with senior-level business leaders in support of achieving cross-functional business objectives.  Ability to influence executives.8+ years of relevant experience with a Bachelor's degree or equivalent combination of education and work experience.  MBA preferred.Here’s our story; now tell us yoursDell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow.
